item.title: Arch Linux Sway Install Guide
item.description:
Updated: 2022-03-24

This guide is for installing arch linux (UEFI) with:

  • sway
  • wayland
  • ly
  • Paru
  • BTRFS file system including subvolumes.
  • Snapper.
  • Snap-pac-grub.
  • Bootable snapshots.
  • Qemu/kvm with iommu setup.
  • Gaming.
